Hi Stefan,
  I use a program called VLC Player. It plays anything you throw at it and ya dont need to D/L codecs and codec packs.  You can get it here: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
  Rhonda

Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
          Hi Frank,

I can't hear any sound in all of your videos. Do I need a codec or
something? Or a special player? A never before came across ".3g2"
files.

Stefan

-- 

> This is kinda light blasted by the sunlight, but it's direct mode, no
> sound chamber, and using the lool antenna. There is one loud voice in
> the middle "go back to the clay earth"--or "go back the player" a
> broadcast frag?

> Frank-S
